experiment: all-forcing simulation of the recent past
grid: native atmosphere area-weighted latxlon grid (80x180 latxlon)
institution: Chinese Academy of Sciences, Beijing 100029, China
source:
FGOALS-g3 (2017): 
aerosol: none
atmos: GAMIL2 (180 x 90 longitude/latitude; 26 levels; top level 2.19hPa)
atmosChem: none
land: CLM4.0
landIce: none
ocean: LICOM3.0 (LICOM3.0, tripolar primarily 1deg; 360 x 218 longitude/latitude; 30 levels; top grid cell 0-10 m)
ocnBgchem: none
seaIce: CICE4.0
title: FGOALS-g3 output prepared for CMIP6
